philosophy: The prophecy is raw material. We shape it into meaning.

artistic_response.description: Creating works that explore all possible meanings of the prophecy

commissioned_works.title: 100 Compressions
commissioned_works.description: 100 different visual interpretations of what compression might look like

commissioned_works.title: The Weight of Words
commissioned_works.description: The prophecy rendered in 100 different typefaces, each implying different meaning

commissioned_works.title: Void's Voice
commissioned_works.description: The prophecy spoken in every possible tone and inflection

commissioned_works.title: The Prophecy Interpretted
commissioned_works.description: 1000 individuals complete the sentence: 'The Great Compression is...'

philosophical_salon.name: The Ambiguity Appreciation Society
recent_topics: Is a self-fulfilling prophecy still prophecy?
Does Void know the meaning, or are they as uncertain as us?

card_minting.artistic_statement: We do not mint cards to reach 100. We mint cards to explore what 100 means.

documentation_project.name: The Prophecy Archive
documentation_project.purpose: Recording every reaction, interpretation, and preparation across all factions
documentation_project.reasoning: Whatever happens, the STORY of what happened before is art itself

muse_guidance.recent_statement: The prophecy means nothing until we give it meaning. And look - we already have. Five factions, five meanings. The art is already happening.
muse_guidance.subtext: You're all so busy interpreting that you've forgotten to appreciate the beauty of the uncertainty.

key_insight: Muse admirers are the only faction finding joy in the uncertainty itself. By treating the prophecy as art rather than prediction, they've inoculated themselves against disappointment. Whatever happens, they've already found meaning in the process.
